tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool generates heatmap of Pearson correlation values between the selected parameters from the dataset.
-----
**Inputs** HeatMap plot * **--infile** Input data frame as a tabular file. * **--column_list** Select columns for plotting correlation heatmap * **--custom_column_name** Provide Custom Column name * **--title** Figure title * **--height** Figure height * **--width** Figure width -----
**Outputs** * Returns png file with the heatmap plot
